Description: ジーの旅人協会は、これを鋳造する為に収集を始めた。[貴方の家系で前の船長が、父親は船員を助けるために己を犠牲にした事をつきとめた証です。]@{M}The Zociety of Zeafarers took up a collection to have this struck. [A previous captain in your lineage found that their father had sacrificed himself to save his crew.]
Name: 記念品: 死後のメダル@{M}Trophy: A Posthumous Medal
